lines: 1. Nyancha ng'umbugati y'ense y'emechando,Naria IgoroEnse nere botakoira,'S'amarig' aratinyigwe
(Nyancha ng'umbunyancha nyancha y'emerindo)(Naigur'abanchwa 'banchwabakondangeria)Bwango natotige emechando,Tomenye n'Omonene botambe.(Bwango, bwangonatotige emechando),Tomenye n'Omonene botambe.
2. Nyancha ng'umbu,'S'Omorembe,'Bibe n'ense biaetire,Emechando yaerire,Abarosu batimoke.
